name: Developmental Client Care

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Developmental Client Care is a Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Moreno Valley, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.9M in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.9M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
